text: Pramod Kumar Sharma is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Chhattisgarh Legislative Assembly from Baloda Bazar in the 2018 Chhattisgarh Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Janta Congress Chhattisgarh.My NetaBalodabazar Assembly Election Result: JCC(J)'s PRAMOD KUMAR wonChhattisgarh election results: Here is the full list of winners ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Chhattisgarh Legislative Assembly Category:Janta Congress Chhattisgarh politicians Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Chhattisgarh Category:People from Baloda Bazar district Category:Chhattisgarh MLAs 2018–
title: Pramod Kumar Sharma
